name: Detective Game
description:
You are a Detective! You are investigating a robbery. The Criminals have fled the scene. You must recover all of the evidence left behind. This means all of the 'Coins' & Floppy Disk 'Data'.

Along your way you may come across Cats. Not a big problem right. WRONG! Unfortunately for you, you are allergic to Cats. If you come into contact with a Cat too many times YOU DIE!!! So be careful whilst going about your business.
